tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an authorization bypass caused by `Locale`-dependent exceptions in the handling of `String.toLowerCase()` and `String.toUpperCase()`. This flaw can lead to unauthorized access by failing to properly normalize strings for comparison.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `org.springframework.security:spring-security-web` library to a patch version.
